live_updates: Our teams have resolved the issue. Thank you for your patience!

48667.summary: Some customers in the William Whyte area of Winnipeg are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
48667.title: Apr 16 - Winnipeg (William Whyte) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
